How many people are affected by megalencephaly-capillary malformation syndrome ?,"The prevalence of MCAP is unknown. At least 150 affected individuals have been reported in the medical literature. Because the condition is often thought to be misdiagnosed or underdiagnosed, it may be more common than reported.",GHR,megalence
